Who We Are

🎓 Our Origins

We are students from the Master in Advanced Programming for AAA Videogames and the Master in Animation & Digital Arts for AAA Videogames. We're the team behind the project The Hound of Ulster, built on our custom in-house engine called Sobrassada Engine.

🕹️ The Game

Take the role of Cu Chulainn and embark on an epic journey to recover the Bull of Cooley, filled with fast-paced and dynamic combat inspired by Celtic mythology.

📣 Follow the Progress

On this site, we’ll post development updates in our blog, as well as downloadable builds of the game as we release them. Stay tuned!
